Html:
Hi ,
Im using WPF datagrid.Im having requirement to provide reset functionlity for wpf datagrid.Whenever user edits a cell,automatic cell end editing is performed by datagrid automatically..so those gets changed in observable collection.Whenever user clicks on reset button which is not part of datagrid.shud reset entire rows edited in datagrid .

Any idea how to do this kind of problems

With Regards,
Mahens
